eshmun.modelrepair.sat

Class AbstractSatSolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • eshmun.modelrepair.sat.AbstractSatSolver
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SAT4jSolver, UnsatCoreSolver

    public abstract class AbstractSatSolver
extends java.lang.Object
    The abstract implementation for the SAT solver interface. This interface will take an AbstractExpression and solve its satisfiability problem.
    Since:
    0.1
    Author:
    Emile Chartouni, Kinan Dak Al Bab

      Gets the next Solution (as a list of variable IDs that are true).
